abstract.text: Creates a value that maps the specified size, in the specified unit
to the corresponding value in points in the associated scene.

abstract.text: Declare the user interface and behavior for your app on every platform.
Provides access to a value in points that corresponds to the specified
physical measurement.
Creates a value that maps the specified set of physical length measurements,
in the specified unit, to a corresponding set of values measured in points in the
associated scene.
Creates a value that maps the specified point, whose dimensions are specified
in physical length measurements in the given unit, to the corresponding value in points in the
associated scene.
Creates a value that maps the specified size, in the specified unit
to the corresponding value in points in the associated scene.
Creates a value that maps the specified size, in the specified unit
to the corresponding value in points in the associated scene.
Creates a value that maps the specified point, whose dimensions are specified
in physical length measurements in the given unit, to the corresponding value in points in the
associated scene.
Creates a value that maps the specified single physical length measurement,
in the specified unit, to the corresponding value in points in the
associated scene.
Creates a value that maps the specified rectangle, whose dimensions are specified
in physical length measurements in the given unit, to the corresponding value in points in the
associated scene.
Creates a value that maps the specified
, whose dimensions are specified
in physical length measurements in the given unit, to the corresponding value in points in the
associated scene.
A type that can serve as the animatable data of an animatable type.
A structure that contains a point in a two-dimensional coordinate system.
A structure that contains the location and dimensions of a rectangle.
A structure that contains width and height values.
A rectangle in a 3D coordinate system.
A point in a 3D coordinate system.
A size that describes width, height, and depth in a 3D coordinate system.
A unit of measure for length.
The basic type for floating-point scalar values in Core Graphics and related frameworks.
